search-iTunes-form.term-placeholder: Write here what you want to search for

errors.exception: There was an error making the request: %exceptionMsg%
errors.httpError: The server responded with a %httpStatus% status (%httpResponse%), try again later

no-network.title: No network detected
no-network.text: Seems you have no internet access, connect and try again

no-term.title: Term no specified
no-term.text: You must write something to search for

not-found.title: No results found
not-found.text: We coulnd't find anything with the terms you used, revise for misspellings or try writing it with similar words
